Amy's crying... kicking at whatever she can't see behind Her breathing is quick... uneven... small gasps.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: I can't, David. I have to go back.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Amy, no. We can't go back. They'll be waiting for us.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: I can't breathe.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Yes you can. Just close your eyes. Grab hold of my leg and I'll lead you. It won't be much further. Amy takes hold of David's ankle, then squeezes her eyes s and hangs on... willing her mind to another place, as she crawls behind David. They continue on... nothing but darkness in front and beh them. The tunnel squeezes even tighter... the walls have partia collapsed... just a sliver of space to drag themselves through. DIRT RAINS OVER THEM as they crawl... like the passage is only seconds from caving in.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: David, please. It’s going to fall.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: No it isn’t. Come on. David pulls them along, squinting into the black... until hand grabs a HANDFUL OF FLESH AND FUR... a LOUD SQUEAK. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Shit! David pulls his hand back... watches as a MOUSE scurries away... to a larger SHADOW... a MOVING SHADOW... DOZENS O MICE fill the tunnel ahead.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: What is it? What's the matter?

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: You can't scream, Amy.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: They'll hear us if you scream. David continues toward the mound... all the SQUEAKING GRO LOUDER.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: David?

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Just keep moving. David's hand drops into the center of the pile. Mice scatter... crawl over his hands... up his arm. David reaches further... more mice squirm out from under hands... slither out a METAL GRATE IN THE WALL, or scurry beneath him... to Amy. Amy feels the movement... the tiny feet running all over skin. She GASPS to hold back that scream. The frightened mice race up the tunnel walls... drop back down onto David and Amy's backs... into their hair... ove their faces. Amy's about to fill this tunnel with her cries.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We're almost there. They keep crawling... sliding over the tiny bodies... unt finally, the SQUEAKS FADE. All we can hear is David and A breathing... desperately trying to make it to wherever th tunnel leads. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: And then a SLIVER OF LIGHT appears ahead. David sees it.. his movement quickens.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I see something.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Light. A door maybe. They drag themselves toward it... finally reach another 6 dirt box. David rolls out of the tunnel. He pulls Amy out, and she slaps away any remaining rodents. They stare up to a thin square-shaped crack of light above them.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: (whispering) Where are we? David shakes his head... no idea. He presses up against t square... inches it upward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...through the crack... scanning over the floor of a diml lit room... legs of furniture... a plate of half-eaten fo lies on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: OH, GOD, PLEASE NO
dialogues.text: David lowers the square... holds a finger over his mouth Amy... not a sound. MAN’S VOICE (0.S.) I’1l give you money. As much as you want. We hear an 0.S. STRUGGLE... but it’s distant... false. David pushes the square up again... peers through the crack... widening... and that's when we see who's screaming... it's one of the snuff films playing on a VID MONITOR. A MAN is begging Killer One for his life.  VACANCY 3-23-06 64.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David rises up from the hole, pulling Amy up behind him. They see the LARGE PICTURE WINDOW overlooking the parking lot, and duck down out of sight They glance around the room... a wall of monitors, all displaying different angles of the Honeymoon Suite and mo grounds. Video cameras and equipment are piled all over t place. There are shelves of VHS TAPES lining the walls, each one hand-labeled... "Steve and Sharon S.", "Glen and Flo D.", "Brian and Alex P.". This is Mason's private collection. Another shelf is stacked full of dusty watches, jewelry, dolls, truck stop souvenirs, a collection of REARVIEW MIR

dialogues.speaker: CRUCIFIXES AND RABBITS FEET... DRIVERS LICENSES OF VARIOU
dialogues.text: PEOPLE... all victims. This is a very creepy room... especially with the man's 0 PLEAS washing over the scene. They ease to the door... glance out into the MOTEL OFFICE

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: We're no better off than we were.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: We're still alive. That's better David spins... starts digging through the mess.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: There's gotta be something here we can use. Amy joins in... pulls back a blanket, revealing a TELEPHO

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: David. Amy grabs the phone... lifts the receiver... we hear the DIAL TONE. She dials “911”. We hear the RING along with her.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: I tried that already. It was... And then... (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: MAN’S VOICE (V.0.) 911 emergency.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: They’re trying to kill us. We're... The 0.S. JINGLE OF THE OFFICE DOOR OPENING freezes Amy. MAN’S VOICE (V.0.) What is your location, ma’am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mason hurries across the room with Killer One right behin him.

dialogues.speaker: MASON
dialogues.text: They didn't just disappear. Mason strides into the back room. And we enter with him.. expecting to see David and Amy sitting there waiting... ...but they're gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mason moves to the wall of monitors... looks over all the angles.

dialogues.speaker: MASON
dialogues.text: They're out there somewhere. And then a MUFFLED VOICE...

dialogues.speaker: PHONE VOICE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Hello, Ma’am. Mason turns... sees the receiver lying on the floor. He picks it up.

dialogues.speaker: PHONE VOICE, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: I need your location. Mason TEARS THE CORD OUT OF THE WALL. He sees the CORNER THE RUG still flipped over above the trap door. He nods t Killer One.

dialogues.speaker: MASON
dialogues.text: Get down there after ‘em. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Killer One throws open the trap door. Mason goes to the picture window... sees Killer Two standing in the Honeymo Suite doorway. Mason motions behind Killer Two, to the bathroom... the t door. Then he points to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: MASON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: They're under us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David and Amy are squirming... sliding... crawling throug the darkness... desperately trying to get to the other en that tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: KILLER ONE...
dialogues.text: ...dragging himself along the tiny passage.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID AND AMY...
dialogues.text: ...crawling as fast as they can. Their breathing is panic and fast. Amy keeps trying to glance behind them into the darkness. to what she knows is coming... but she can't turn... can' see.

dialogues.speaker: KILLER ONE...
dialogues.text: ...coming fast... moving smoothly through the tunnel. He' done this enough to be an expert.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: KILLER Two... ...stopping... listening... hearing movement ahead, and pulling the knife from his belt before he continues on.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID AND AMY...
dialogues.text: ...their faces dripping with sweat... charging on into th black. No idea what's waiting just ahead of them.

dialogues.speaker: KILLER ONE...
dialogues.text: ...seeing a FAINT SHAPE ahead of him in the darkness. We can't make it out, but we all know it's Amy. Killer One pulls his knife... closes in on the shape. It grows closer... clearer... he readies the blade... pul it back as far as the tunnel will allow so he can drive i down into Amy... only a few feet away... slipping out of darkness... Killer One swings... then stops his motion ju in time... ...because it isn’t Amy. It’s Killer Two, with his knife ready to stab as well. They glance back... see the METAL GRATE PULLED DOWN FROM WALL.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID AND AMY...
dialogues.text: ...scrambling along the tunnel... finally reaching a RUST LADDER.  VACANCY 3-23-06 68.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A square of the plank floor lifts up. David and Amy climb out of the hole... find themselves inside a SMALL SHED. I filled with crates... shelves of tools... piles of old luggage. David closes the trap door

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Help me. David pulls at a large crate. Amy pushes... until they've got it sitting on top of the trap door. David goes to the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tool shed sits at the back of the parking lot. We see David's face appear in the dirty window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David peers out the window.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: We're at the other end of the lot Amy slides to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: And they'll look for us here. Maybe not right away, but they will.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: But we can't try to run. Not yet We have to let them think we've gotten away. Let them go after us. Then we can run.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: What if they look in here first?

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Jesus, Amy, I don't know. I'm doing the best I can here. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Amy nods... fights back tears. David sees it. He slides down... wraps his arms around her... pulls her close to h protecting her.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Nothing to be sorry for. I'm the one that left the interstate.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: No, I mean about everything else... about us... about Charlie. I should have watched him closer... made sure the gate was up... that he didn't go near the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Shhhh. It isn't your fault. None of it was. It was an accident.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: But he was so little. He thought I'd be there to catch him. I should've been there. And now Amy breaks down... sobs into David's chest.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Listen to me, you have to stop blaming yourself. Nobody else does. David pushes her back so he can look into her face.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We just have to get out of here first, okay? Everything starts over again once we make it out of this. Amy manages a nod. David kisses her. An 0.S. RUMBLE... TIRES OVER GRAVEL. David rises back up to the window... sees a HIGHWAY PATRO CAR pull into the lot.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Somebody else is out there. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Amy joins David at the window. They watch as a COP steps of the car.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: The 911. Amy starts for the door. David grabs her... she looks at like he’s crazy. He motions out the window... to the smil Mason walking out of the office... shaking hands with the cop.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Or he’s one of them. Like the truck driver. David studies Mason and the cop talking.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You didn’t even tell them where we were. Why would they come?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mason and the cop stand at the patrol car. cop There was a 911 call traced to this number.

dialogues.speaker: MASON
dialogues.text: Are you sure? It’s just me here tonight. The cop scans the area. CoP And you run the place? (off Mason’s nod) Then I won’t disturb anybody if I take a look around. The cop starts toward the motel rooms. Mason lags a step behind, throwing quick glances around the lot.

dialogues.speaker: MASON
dialogues.text: We don’t even have phones in these rooms. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: cop I still need to check it out. The cop veers straight for the Honeymoon Suite. Mason pic up his pace... gets his hand to the door before the cop.. pulls the key from the wire on his belt and stretches it the door. He jiggles that sticky handle.

dialogues.speaker: MASON
dialogues.text: Shit, I forgot, this one works ona different key than the rest. Lemme run back to the office and grab it. Mason starts away. CoP Can I have that? (motions to the key) For the other rooms. Mason hesitates, then nods... tosses the key to the cop. Mason watches him move down to room 7... open the door. Mason spins toward the office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David and Amy watch Mason trot into the office... watch t cop disappear into Room #7.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: They're looking for us.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: What if he’s here to help us?

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: He isn’t. That guy wouldn’t let him look around by himself like that. And I called 911 before, remember? It was them that answered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cop moves around the room... glances around the bed. CoP Hello? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: No answer. He walks to the bathroom... flips on the light the room’s empty. He turns the light off... starts back for the door, then stops... looks to the adjoining room door... the door lea to the Honeymoon Suite. He flips the lock... pulls the door wide. And the Honeymoon Suite door is already open. CoP (CONT'D) Hello? He steps through the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cop enters... scans over the room... the furniture to about... the shattered mirror pieces on the floor... the TRAP DOOR in the bathroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cop walks into the bathroom... crouches beside the hole... leans in. And it’s too dark down there to see anything, so we’re ju waiting for one of the killers to come springing out of t hole, knife flailing. But they don’t. And the cop pulls his flashlight... aims the beam into th dirt hole. It’s empty. He studies it a beat, then stands... walks back into the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cop moves past the overturned lamp, then glances up.. the TOWELS HANGING IN THE CORNERS. He pulls one of the towels away, REVEALING THE CAMERA. He stares back into the lens, DRAWING HIS GUN as he turns And there are the VIDEO TAPES SCATTERED ABOUT. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The cop goes to the television... turns it on and presses play on the VCR. TIGHT ON THE COP’S FACE... ...aS we HEAR THE 0.S. SCREAMS. He flinches at what he se Shock and fear wash over his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David and Amy stare through the window... see the Honeymo Suite door swing open... the cop step into the doorway, g in hand. His nervous eyes dart around the empty lot

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: He looks scared. David stares at the cop... tries to read what the cop’s thinking.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Maybe. I don’t know. And then a THUD, as someone POUNDS ON THE TRAP DOOR, lift the crate into the air. It SLAMS back to the floor. David and Amy spin to it, then look back to the cop... ...hustling toward his car

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: He’s going to leave, David. David’s frozen... unsure. ANOTHER THUD FROM THE TRAP DOOR

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: He’s going to leave! And David knows they don’t have a choice. He grabs Amy’s arm... throws open the door, and they charge out of the s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cop hurries toward the patrol car.

dialogues.speaker: HELP US
dialogues.text: The cop turns... sees David and Amy sprinting toward him, waving their arms. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: WAIT
dialogues.text: The cop raises his gun toward them, then sees the terror their faces... their bodies covered in blood and dirt. And he’s seen the tapes... he knows what’s happened to th coP

dialogues.speaker: GET IN THE CAR
dialogues.text: David and Amy slide in the passenger side. The cop charge around to the other side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cop leaps inside... turns the key in the ignition... CLICK. He flips the key back... repeats... MORE CLICKS.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: What's the matter with it? The cop shakes his head, then notices something... ...the hood is raised JUST A FEW INCHES... like someone worked on the engine then silently closed the hood. His eyes jump to the POLICE RADIO... gone... just wires.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: They're not going to let us leave. CoP I’m not givin’ ‘em a choice. Stay here. The cop climbs out, his gun cocked and ready.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Wait! But the cop is already out. Amy reaches over, pounding th door lock down. David and Amy’s heads are snapping in all directions... looking for an attack. They watch through the windshield as the cop moves around front of the car, scanning the area as he lifts the hood. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The cop disappears behind the raised hood.

dialogues.speaker: THE COP'S HAND...
dialogues.text: ...moving across the engine... to the battery... and the SLICED BATTERY CABLES. TIGHT ON THE COP'S FACE... ...seeing the cables. CoP Shit.

dialogues.speaker: BEHIND THE COP...
dialogues.text: ...as he raises his hand up onto the hood... pulls it bac down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David and Amy watching the cop reappear as the hood lower At that same moment, a SHAPE RISES UP FROM BEHIND THE COP KILLER ONE. David and Amy CRY OUT. The cop has an instant beat of confusion, as he sees them SCREAM. But then he knows... raises the gun as he starts spin... ...but Killer One SLAMS THE KNIFE INTO HIS BACK before he turn.

dialogues.speaker: THE FACES OF DAVID AND AMY...
dialogues.text: ...Watching the murder in shocked horror. All the death they've seen on the video tapes is suddenly right in fron them... and very real. Amy continues to SCREAM. David throws the door open, as w hear the STABBING THUDS and the cop’S PAINFUL GROANS. David grabs Amy... pulls her out of the car with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David and Amy scramble out... see the cop’s legs lying in front of the patrol car... Killer One moving around the c toward them. They spin... see Mason standing at the center of the park lot, twirling his gun.

dialogues.speaker: MASON
dialogues.text: You just had to drag him into this didn’t you. You might as well have stuck that knife in him yourselves. Now here comes Killer Two walking out of the tool shed. David and Amy search for a place to run... all they have Mason and the killers closing in from all sides. So they take off back to the only place they have left... Honeymoon Suite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David and Amy rush inside... slam the door closed behind them.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: They killed him, David! They just killed him. Suddenly the front door swings open, and Killer One's fac jams through the crack. He reaches his hand up to snap th chain. David scoops up one of the shards of broken mirror from t floor raises it above his head to DRIVE IT INTO KILLER ON HAND. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Killer One CRIES OUT... pulls back his hand. David slams door closed again... bolts the lock. He points to the bed

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Help me move it over! David and Amy drag the bed... jam it against the door. Da tips a dresser onto its side... shoves it across the floo and over the HOLE IN THE BATHROOM FLOOR, blocking it. He jams the shower rod over the dresser, wedging it against sink to secure the dresser against the floor.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: They'11 find another way in.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: I'm just trying to slow them down. David pulls open the adjoining room door... it's open int Room #7.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Come on! David and Amy rush through the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They sprint across the room... pull open the next adjoini room door, revealing the door to Room #6. David pushes against it... locked. David slams his shoulder into the door... nothing.

dialogues.speaker: SHIT
dialogues.text: David looks around... spots the television. He grabs it jerks the cords loose from the wall, then carries it acro the room and THROWS IT THROUGH THE DOOR. The door splinters open.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hurry! David and Amy race through the shattered door  VACANCY 3-23-06 78.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David and Amy charge into the room... race across it. Dav pulls open the next door, then KICKS THAT ADJOINING ROOM OPEN. They sprint into the next room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David and Amy repeat it all again... blast their way into adjoining room... keep running.

dialogues.speaker: TIGHT ON THE ADJOINING DOOR...
dialogues.text: ...aS it shatters open. David and Amy pour into the room. race across it, then realize there are no more doors. David bolts the front door and secures the chain across i They grab a dresser... drag it over the floor and prop it against the adjoining room door, blocking it.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: They'll be coming, David. (glancing around) Where do we go now? David searches the room. He hurries into the bathroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David goes to the window... turns the handle. The window cranks open... pushes the rusty nail over, and swings ope

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Here. Amy enters... climbs up onto the commode to slide out. Bu the window's too small... no way to fit.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: I can't. There's no way.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Just keep trying. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: I'd barely get halfway out. You wouldn't even come close. David kicks up the bathroom rug, looking for another secr exit... nothing.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David and Amy hurry back into the room. David peeks out t edge of the window.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: I don't see them.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: They're out there.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Maybe around the back... or underneath us. If I could make it to the office. He kept his gun there.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: And he killed those people with it. What are the odds he put it back?

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Better than they are of them not finding us if we just wait here. Then David glances up... notices something. The ceiling i made of foam tiles. He grabs a chair... climbs up and pus one of the tiles away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David's head pokes up through the ceiling... scans the ar

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: This could work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David drops back down. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: What? David tears a shred off of Amy's shirt.

dialogues.speaker: AMY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What are you doing? David goes into the bathroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David rushes to the window... jams the piece of material a sliver of splintered wood. The cloth hangs there... blo in the breeze.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Leaving them a trail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David hurries back to the chair, motions Amy up.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: They'll think you made it out the window. They won't look up there.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: What about you?

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: I'll get to the office. To that asshole's gun.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: It's not going to be there.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Something will be there. Something I can use.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: No. You said you wouldn't leave me again.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: It's just for a minute. Swear to God. Amy doesn't like this a bit, but she steps up onto the ch (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You just have to stay real quiet up there, Amy. Amy nods... pulls herself upward. David takes her legs an shoves her up into the hole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amy rises into the attic... crawls over the wooden joists

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amy looks down from the hole.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Now pull the tile back over.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: I don't want to do this, David.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: We have to. It's our only shot. Amy starts pulling the tile back over the hole.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And you have to be quiet, baby. I mean not a sound. No matter what happens, you can't make a sound. Amy nods... looks like she's about to cry.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We're going to make it out of here.

dialogues.speaker: AMY
dialogues.text: Promise?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David's face stares up through the sliver of space at Amy

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: Promise. David motions for Amy to pull the tile across. As she doe David disappears. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Remember. Not a sound. Don't even move. Amy peers down through the cracks between the tiles... sh can see slivers of movement... David pushing the chair ba across the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David shoves the chair back under the desk... hears 0.S. RUSTLING from beyond the adjoining wall.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: They're coming, Amy. TI have to go.

dialogues.speaker: AMY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: David?

dialogues.speaker: DAVID
dialogues.text: They won't know you're up there. Stay quiet and they'll never know. David starts toward the door... stops and glances back to ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I love you. And then David pulls the chain... opens the front door... comes FACE TO FACE WITH KILLER Two. Before David can react, Killer Two draws his knife back.. swings an uppercut with it TIGHT ON DAVID'S FACE... ...as he GASPS... his eyes go wide. Killer Two shoves him back into the room... steps in afte him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amy stares down through the crack... sees David standing below her. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: She wants to scream... instead throws a hand over her mou to silence a cry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Killer Two moves close to David... nose to nose... raises knife again.

dialogues.speaker: AMY'S HORRIFIED FACE...
dialogues.text: ...as we hear DAVID'S AGONIZING MOAN. Through the cracks, Amy sees David crumble to his knees. Amy swallows a scream... watches with tear-filled eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David GASPS... starts crawling out of the room. Killer Tw watches the pathetic attempt at escape. David struggles every inch... drags himself toward the op door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David crawls out the door. He looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...on a smiling Mason standing over David, holding a VIDE CAMERA to his eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...grainy and trembling... zoomed in on David's face star up at the camera... the life slipping away, until he fina slides to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Mason lowers the camera... nods to the Killers in the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: MASON
dialogues.text: Let's get her out here and do this. Mason walks into the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mason and the Killers scan the room... see the CLOTH FLAP IN THE WINDOW.

dialogues.speaker: MASON
dialogues.text: Find her. Killer One and Killer Two rush out of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amy sees Mason standing just below her. She's trembling s much that she can barely support herself. Finally, Mason walks out. Amy eases back over the joists. leans against the wall, pulling her knees up tightly to h chest. Tears pour down her face... she's all alone.
